seller_research.name: Whatfix
seller_research.description: Whatfix is an Indian SaaS-based digital adoption platform that provides in-app guidance, training, and performance support for web applications and software.

pricing_models.description: Whatfix pricing is based on two components: a flat per-application fee, plus user license fees.
Whatfix offers premium only subscription plans.

buyer_research.name: ICICI Bank
buyer_research.description: ICICI Bank is an Indian multinational bank and financial services company headquartered in Mumbai with a registered office in Vadodara.
goals: To grow the core operating profit in a risk-calibrated manner
To establish itself as a thought leader in the Banking and Financial Services sector
use_cases: FASTag for payments at various national and state highways, toll plazas
challenges: Growing competition in the digital banking space
Adapting to changing customer behavior and preferences

competitors.name: Pendo
cons: Pricing can be high for large enterprises

competitors.name: Userlane
cons: Not suitable for complex enterprise software

pains: How can Whatfix's digital adoption platform help ICICI Bank overcome the challenges of adapting to changing customer behavior and preferences?
How can Whatfix's solution help ICICI Bank's employees effectively use digital banking platforms and tools?
What are the scalability and customization options of Whatfix's platform to cater to ICICI Bank's large customer base and diverse banking services?
Can Whatfix's analytics and performance support features help ICICI Bank measure the effectiveness of its digital banking initiatives and identify areas for improvement?
How can Whatfix's solution help ICICI Bank reduce the risk and compliance management challenges associated with digital banking?
objections: Whatfix's pricing model may be too expensive for our organization's budget.
We have already invested heavily in our existing digital banking infrastructure, and we're not sure if Whatfix's solution can integrate seamlessly with our systems.
Our employees may resist adopting a new digital adoption platform, and we're concerned about the potential for low user adoption rates.
How does Whatfix's solution differ from its competitors, such as WalkMe, Pendo, and Userlane, and what unique value proposition does it offer?
What is the ROI of implementing Whatfix's digital adoption platform, and how can we measure its impact on our organization's bottom line?

messages.content: Hi, I'm [Sales Person's Name] from Whatfix. Thank you for taking the time to speak with me today, [ICICI Bank's Representative's Name]. I understand that ICICI Bank is a leading multinational bank and financial services company. Can you tell me a little bit about your current digital banking initiatives and what you're hoping to achieve?

Thank you for having me. Yes, we're constantly looking at ways to improve our digital banking experience for our customers. We want to make it more seamless and user-friendly. Currently, we're facing challenges in adapting to changing customer behavior and preferences. We're also concerned about risk and compliance management.

I understand. It sounds like you're facing some significant challenges. Can you tell me more about your current approach to employee training and onboarding for your digital banking platforms? How do you currently support your employees in terms of guidance and performance?

We have a comprehensive training program in place, but we're finding it difficult to ensure that our employees are effectively using our digital banking platforms and tools. We've invested heavily in our existing infrastructure, but we're concerned about the potential for low user adoption rates.

I see. It sounds like you're looking for a solution that can help drive user adoption and provide personalized guidance and support for your employees. Whatfix's digital adoption platform is designed to do just that. Our platform provides in-app guidance, training, and performance support for web applications and software. We've had success with other large enterprises in the financial sector. Would you like to learn more about how our solution can help address your specific challenges?
Yes, that sounds interesting. Can you tell me more about how Whatfix's platform can help us measure the effectiveness of our digital banking initiatives and identify areas for improvement?

Absolutely. Our analytics and performance support features are designed to help organizations like yours measure the effectiveness of their digital initiatives and identify opportunities for improvement. We can also provide you with insights on how to optimize the user experience and improve engagement. Would you like a demo of our platform to see how it can help you achieve your goals?
That would be great, thank you. Before we move forward, can you tell me more about Whatfix's pricing model and how it compares to other digital adoption platforms on the market?

Whatfix pricing is based on two components: a flat per-application fee, plus user license fees. We also offer a free trial and premium subscription plans starting at $15,500.00 per month. In terms of how we compare to our competitors, Whatfix offers a unique combination of in-app guidance, training, and performance support that sets us apart from other digital adoption platforms.
Thank you for the information. Who else is involved in the decision-making process for this type of solution, and what are the timelines for implementation?

I'd be happy to help facilitate further discussions with your team. Can I schedule a follow-up meeting to discuss the findings from our demo and answer any additional questions you may have? We can also discuss the implementation timelines and process in more detail.

pain_points: adapting to changing customer behavior and preferences
ensuring employees are effectively using digital banking platforms and tools
success_indicators: measure the effectiveness of digital banking initiatives
optimize the user experience and improve engagement
decision_committee: other stakeholders involved in the decision-making process

Risk and compliance management is a concern for ICICI Bank
Low user adoption rates of digital banking platforms and tools are a challenge for ICICI Bank

ICICI Bank wants to optimize the user experience and improve engagement

The seller could have provided more information about the implementation process and timelines
The seller could have addressed the pricing model objection more effectively

features.name: Digital Adoption Platform
features.description: Whatfix's digital adoption platform provides in-app guidance, training, and performance support for web applications and software, enabling ICICI Bank to improve user adoption rates of digital banking platforms and tools.

features.name: Interactive Guides
features.description: Whatfix's interactive guides feature provides step-by-step walkthroughs and contextualized guidance, enabling ICICI Bank to effectively support employees in terms of guidance and performance, and measure the effectiveness of digital banking initiatives.

features.name: Analytics
features.description: Whatfix's analytics feature provides insights and data to identify opportunities for improvement, enabling ICICI Bank to optimize the user experience and improve engagement.

features.name: Flows
features.description: Whatfix's flows feature enables ICICI Bank to create customized workflows and automate tasks, improving the overall user experience and reducing risk and compliance management concerns.

features.name: In-app Guidance
features.description: Whatfix's in-app guidance feature provides real-time support and guidance, enabling ICICI Bank to improve user adoption rates and reduce the time and effort required for employee training and onboarding.

features.name: Performance Support
features.description: Whatfix's performance support feature provides continuous support and improvement, enabling ICICI Bank to measure the effectiveness of digital banking initiatives and identify opportunities for improvement.

messages.content: Hello everyone, thank you for taking the time to join this demo call today. I'm excited to show you how Whatfix can help ICICI Bank address some of the pain points we discussed during our discovery call. Before we dive in, I just want to confirm that we have all the stakeholders involved in the decision-making process on the line. Can you please confirm who's joining us today?
Yes, we have our digital banking team lead, Piyush, and our risk and compliance manager, Rohan, joining us today.

Great, thank you for confirming. Let's get started with the demo. As we discussed, ICICI Bank is facing challenges with adapting to changing customer behavior and preferences, risk and compliance management, low user adoption rates, and ensuring employees are effectively using digital banking platforms and tools. Our digital adoption platform is designed to address these pain points. I'd like to show you how our interactive guides feature can provide step-by-step walkthroughs and contextualized guidance to support your employees.

As you can see on the screen, our interactive guides feature provides a seamless user experience, allowing your employees to easily navigate your digital banking platforms and tools. This feature also enables you to measure the effectiveness of your digital banking initiatives and identify opportunities for improvement.
That's impressive. But how does this feature address our risk and compliance management concerns?

Our flows feature is designed to reduce risk and compliance management concerns by enabling you to create customized workflows and automate tasks. This feature improves the overall user experience and reduces the risk of non-compliance. I'd like to show you a demo of how this feature works.

As you can see, our flows feature allows you to create customized workflows that are tailored to your specific business needs. This feature has been successful in reducing risk and compliance management concerns for our previous clients, such as HDFC Bank.
That's great to hear. But how do you ensure that your solution is scalable and can integrate with our existing systems?

Our digital adoption platform is designed to be scalable and can integrate with your existing systems. We have a proven track record of successful implementations with large enterprises like yours. I'd be happy to provide you with some case studies and references from our previous clients.
That would be great, thank you. We're also concerned about the pricing model and implementation costs. Can you address those concerns?

Absolutely. Our pricing model is based on two components: a flat per-application fee, plus user license fees. We also offer a free trial and premium subscription plans starting at $15,500.00 per month. Regarding implementation costs, we can discuss the implementation timelines and process in more detail. We've had success with our implementation methodology, which ensures a smooth and efficient process.
Before I summarize the demo, I'd like to ask if you have any other questions or concerns about our digital adoption platform?
No, I think that covers everything. Thank you for the demo, it was very informative.

You're welcome. Just to summarize, our digital adoption platform is designed to address your pain points, including adapting to changing customer behavior and preferences, risk and compliance management, low user adoption rates, and ensuring employees are effectively using digital banking platforms and tools. We believe our solution can provide significant value to ICICI Bank. Next steps, I'd like to discuss the implementation process and timelines in more detail. We can also provide you with a customized trial environment to test our solution. Does that sound good to you?
Yes, that sounds good. Thank you again for the demo.

messages.content: Hi, everyone. Thank you for taking the time to discuss the pricing for our digital adoption platform. I'm excited to review the details with you. As we discussed during the demo, our platform can help address the challenges you're facing with adapting to changing customer behavior and preferences, risk and compliance management, and low user adoption rates of digital banking platforms and tools.

Yes, we're interested in understanding the pricing model and how it can fit our budget constraints. We have a budget of $15,500.00 per month, and we need to ensure that the solution can meet our implementation timelines.

Absolutely, Piyush. Our pricing model is based on two components: a flat per-application fee, plus user license fees. We also offer a free trial and premium subscription plans starting at $15,500.00 per month, which aligns with your budget constraints. Would you like me to explain the pricing model in more detail?
Yes, please explain the pricing model in detail. We want to understand how it works and what we can expect from the implementation.

Our pricing model is designed to be flexible and scalable to meet your growing needs. The flat per-application fee covers the cost of the platform, and the user license fees are based on the number of users you have. We also offer discounts for long-term commitments. With our premium subscription plan, you'll get access to advanced features, dedicated support, and regular updates.
That sounds interesting. Can you tell us more about the implementation costs and timelines? We need to ensure that the solution can be implemented within our desired timeframe.

We understand the importance of timely implementation. Our implementation process is designed to be efficient and streamlined. We can discuss the implementation timelines and process in more detail, but we can typically implement the solution within 6-8 weeks. We'll work closely with your team to ensure a smooth transition and minimize any disruptions to your business.
That sounds reasonable. What kind of ROI can we expect from the implementation of your digital adoption platform?

Our digital adoption platform has been proven to increase user adoption rates, reduce training times, and improve overall productivity. Based on our historical case studies, our customers have seen an average ROI of 3:1 within the first six months of implementation. We're confident that our platform can deliver similar results for ICICI Bank.
That's impressive. What kind of KPIs would we use to measure the success of the implementation?

We recommend tracking KPIs such as user adoption rates, time-to-competency, and overall user engagement. We can work with you to define the KPIs that are most relevant to your business goals and objectives.
We're interested in moving forward with the implementation. What are the next steps?

I'm glad to hear that. The next steps would be to finalize the implementation plan, discuss the integration with your existing systems, and outline the dedicated support services we'll provide. I'll send over a summary of our discussion and the proposed implementation plan for your review. Would that work for you?

free trial and premium subscription plans starting at $15,500.00 per month
pricing_levers: access to advanced features, dedicated support, and regular updates
negotiation_tactics: emphasizing the importance of timely implementation
ROI_calculators: average ROI of 3:1 within the first six months of implementation
historical_case_studies: previous customers have seen an average ROI of 3:1 within the first six months of implementation

messages.content: Hi Rohan, Piyush, thank you for taking the time to discuss the pricing and implementation details of our digital adoption platform. I'm excited to move forward with the negotiation process.

Thank you, Whatfix. Yes, we're interested in moving forward, but we do have some concerns that we'd like to discuss. Our main priority is to ensure that your solution fits within our budget constraints of $15,500 per month.

I completely understand, Rohan. Our pricing model is designed to be flexible and scalable, and we're confident that we can work within your budget constraints. In fact, we offer discounts for long-term commitments, which could be beneficial for ICICI Bank. Can you tell me more about your implementation timelines and how we can work together to ensure a successful rollout?

Our implementation timelines are quite aggressive, and we need to ensure that your solution can be implemented within our desired timeframe. We're also concerned about the ROI expectations and how we can measure the success of your solution.

I understand your concerns, Piyush. Our solution has been proven to provide an average ROI of 3:1 within the first six months of implementation. We also offer historical case studies and implementation process documentation to help alleviate any concerns you may have. In terms of measuring success, we can work with you to establish key performance indicators, such as user adoption rates, time-to-competency, and overall user engagement.

That sounds great, Whatfix. However, we do have some contract terms and procurement concerns that we need to discuss. Can you provide us with a detailed contract outline and address any concerns we may have about procurement?

Absolutely, Rohan. I'd be happy to provide you with a detailed contract outline and address any concerns you may have about procurement. In terms of contract terms, we're willing to offer a 10% discount for a long-term commitment, and we're also open to negotiating the terms of our contract to meet your needs. Can you tell me more about your procurement concerns and how we can work together to alleviate them?
Our main concern is ensuring that your solution integrates seamlessly with our existing systems. Can you provide us with more information about your scalability and integration capabilities?

Our digital adoption platform is designed to be scalable and can integrate with your existing systems. We have a proven track record of successful integrations with some of the largest financial institutions in the world. I'd be happy to provide you with more information and introduce you to our technical team if needed.
That sounds great, Whatfix. I think we're getting close to a decision. Can you summarize the key points we've discussed and provide us with a final proposal?

Certainly, Rohan. To summarize, we've discussed the pricing and implementation details of our digital adoption platform, and we've addressed your concerns about budget constraints, implementation timelines, ROI expectations, and contract terms. We're willing to offer a 10% discount for a long-term commitment and are open to negotiating the terms of our contract to meet your needs. We believe our solution can provide significant value to ICICI Bank, and we're excited about the opportunity to work together. I'll send over a final proposal by the end of the day, and we can discuss any further questions or concerns you may have.

objection_handling: handling budget constraints by offering a premium subscription plan starting at $15,500.00 per month
addressing implementation timelines concern by explaining the implementation process and providing a timeline of 6-8 weeks
stakeholder_consensus: involving key decision makers Piyush and Rohan in the discussion
addressing concerns and questions from both stakeholders
contract_procurement: discussing the pricing model and its components
outlining the implementation plan and integration with existing systems
closing_tactics: emphasizing the ROI of 3:1 within the first six months of implementation
providing a summary of the discussion and the proposed implementation plan for review
assests_used: historical case studies to demonstrate the ROI of the digital adoption platform
